resources.group_description:
You see all group members on a single map, they also see you when you have enabled the tracking.
You can plan a trip with the whole group: place in group points and tracks for easy simultaneous navigation of multiple devices.
resources.group_problem: It is impossible to get access to the group
resources.group_no_latlon: Do not set the initial coordinates of the group
resources.join_note: Please log in to join the group through the website
resources.join_note_byid: Without authorization, you can join the group via any of our app by ID
resources.b1d: The group is a great way of sharing your location
resources.b2d1: In mobile application you are using, look for "Join group" in the ID field enter U or ID or URL of the group (no registration required)
resources.b2d2: If you have registered, you can join the group via the website
resources.bd1d: You can add to the group map gpx-tracks or waypoints, they will be downloaded to all group members automatically
resources.bd2d: If the group type allows allows it, you can control the monitoring on the devices in the group. All at once or individually.
resources.bd3d: You can add a map of the area, at the entrance and exit system will notify the members of the group, and you can also assign additional scripts
resources.bd4d: The ability to specify different actions in the group are bound to different events: such as time, connect to a specific Wifi-network or enter to a geofence
resources.tips1: Suppose you want to monitor for 5 people
resources.tips3: One person registers and creates a group (via the app or website)
resources.tips4: The creator of the group passes to other people group ID, and they come into it
resources.tips5: Ready! Now, when need be, to enable monitoring!
resources.tips6: Learn the answers to frequently asked questions
resources.group_private_warn: Do not distribute this ID without the consent of the members of the group
resources.group_restricted: Participants in this group, only administrators can add Active Audience
